artist: Artist: School of Joseph Mallord William Turner R.A.
description: Sketchbook of 1809 containing 34 watercolors of Winchelsea in Sussex and attributed to Turner.  The titles are purported to be in Turner's handwriting.  34 drawings on 33 leaves and the inside of the back cover.
markings: titles and dates, in pen and ink, on most leaves
medium: Watercolor over graphite on white wove paper
title: Sketchbook:  Winchelsea, Sussex
